Class GridBatchConfig

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.render.grid.GridBatchConfig
public final class GridBatchConfig extends Object
Configuration for grid batch rendering in spatial pipelines.

Platform-independent and headless-certified. No AWT/Swing dependencies.

Since:
2.0.0
Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
